screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .card file in Clash Royale Card Maker
screenshot.caption: CARD file open in Clash Royale Card Maker

description: Clash Royale enthusiasts create CARD files for fun and out of creative expression to share them within fan communities. In the app, you can create a card from scratch by selecting the settings of the card and its various properties.

To save a card as a CARD file with the Clash Royale Card Maker web app, click the "Download" button. Your browser will then download the CARD file to your downloads folder. Also, the file is named after the level of the card and the name you've given it (e.g., a level 5 card named "Example" will produce the Level 5 Example.card file).
